General.Name: Fusion Micro Finance Limited
General.Description: Fusion Micro Finance Limited, a non-banking financial company, provides micro finance lending services to women entrepreneurs in rural and semi-urban areas in India. The company offers unsecured and secured business loans, and machinery loans, as well as small value collateral free loans. As of March 31, 2022, it operated through a network of 934 branches. The company was formerly known as Fusion Microfinance Private Limited and changed its name to Fusion Micro Finance Limited in July 2021. Fusion Micro Finance Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Gurugram, India.

3.Name: Mr. Deepak  Madaan
3.Title: VP of Legal, Compliance Officer & Company Sec.
